structure.unit: ARTICLE X. DOWNTOWN KENDALL SYSTEM BETTERMENT

text.section:
Sec. 32-202. Lump sum payment.
The Board hereby authorizes the Department to pay Downtown Dadeland Residential Condominiums, LLC, a maximum lump sum amount of $572,897 for the installation of new water and sewer lines within a certain limited area of the Downtown Kendall Urban Center District.
